shrimp.name: PhotonMap
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: This function performs a photon map lookup of a surface point "PP" with a surface normal "NN". The lookup type can be "irradiance", or "radiance", in which case the lookup is performed before the BRDF calculation, and after the BRDF calculation respectively. The "estimator" specifies the number of photons used, and "mindepth" the depth at which to consider the photons. This varies with renderer implementation, check your renderer documentation for more details.
